DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether INSTRUCT therapy safe effective treatment cartilage defect knee .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , open-label , single-arm pilot study design investigate safety efficacy INSTRUCT therapy treatment knee cartilage defect . All patient meet eligibility criterion consent participate undergo implantation biodegradable scaffold seed autologous primary chondrocytes bone marrow cell via arthrotomy . Patients followed-up 2 year regular interval . Evaluations include adverse event collection , patient report outcome ( mostly pain function ) , arthroscopic histologic evaluation MRIs ( include dGEMRIC ) .
